snippet: Montreal coach Michel Therrien was short and direct after the Canadiens blew a late lead and lost in overtime to the Tampa Bay Lightning....
lead_paragraph: Montreal coach Michel Therrien was short and direct after the Canadiens blew a late lead and lost in overtime to the Tampa Bay Lightning.

headline.main: Canadiens Blow Lead, Johnson Scores in OT to Lift Lightning
headline.print_headline: Canadiens Blow Lead, Johnson Scores in OT to Lift Lightning
